NAME: Asing Chang
ABOUT:
I am a simple man who loves technology, science,  human behavior, and his family. I guess I am not alone. Here is a few things about me:

1. I love to see how human being human. It fascinates me when I saw designs that echo the beautiful heart of the mind behind. This led me to believe that for any commercial product, a genuine human experience must be the number zero feature. 

2. I believe people are incredibly generous. If we can help just one person touch his or her own generosity each day, the world will be a much happier place. This inspires the creation of The Cogiver Network I hope join me and give your kindness a warm hug at http://cogiver.com.

3. I am a dad of 2 ever running boys. For this reason, I shoot 1D Mk3 (sorry Nikon fans); After I retire, I want to be the geekiest comedian on YouTube. 

4. LinkedIn is the network where things greater than ourselves get started, so if I can add value to your mission, connecting to me is just one click away.

Sincerely
Asing
